classes.name: Axis
classes.docstring: An Axis class for the 3D plots.

methods.name: set_ticks_position
methods.docstring:
Set the ticks position.

Parameters
----------
position : {'lower', 'upper', 'both', 'default', 'none'}
    The position of the bolded axis lines, ticks, and tick labels.

methods.name: get_ticks_position
methods.docstring:
Get the ticks position.

Returns
-------
str : {'lower', 'upper', 'both', 'default', 'none'}
    The position of the bolded axis lines, ticks, and tick labels.

methods.name: set_label_position
methods.docstring:
Set the label position.

Parameters
----------
position : {'lower', 'upper', 'both', 'default', 'none'}
    The position of the axis label.

methods.name: get_label_position
methods.docstring:
Get the label position.

Returns
-------
str : {'lower', 'upper', 'both', 'default', 'none'}
    The position of the axis label.

methods.name: set_pane_color
methods.docstring:
Set pane color.

Parameters
----------
color : :mpltype:`color`
    Color for axis pane.
alpha : float, optional
    Alpha value for axis pane. If None, base it on *color*.

methods.name: set_rotate_label
methods.docstring:
Whether to rotate the axis label: True, False or None.
If set to None the label will be rotated if longer than 4 chars.
